thread.title_full: Apex City of London - March weekend - Review of Apex City of London Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: J381KFdeanc
title: Apex City of London - March weekend
text: Some very good service, only fair breakfast, rooms ok, but very clean, right next to Tower of London, took some time to get there from Heathrow, so not the most central location for theatres and getting in and out of town. Quiet at night, but construction across the street daytimes, however, there is construction all over London these days.
